body.name: Pliwier Full Bed Frame with Charging Station Headboard, Platform Bed with 2-Tier Storage Shelf, Strong Support Legs, Noise-Free, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly
features: PRACTICAL HEADBOARD WITH 2 SHELVES: The headboard storage shelf can hold your glasses, books, or other small items. So that you can get it in time without having to look around.
STORAGE HEADBOARD WITH CHARGING STATION: 2 standard plug outlets and 2 USB ports with cable management 6.6ft long power cord. Allows you to easily charge electronic products.

STURDY & NO BOX SPRING: The full bed is constructed of heavy duty metal frame and metal slats to provide optimal support for all types of mattresses without the use of box springs. Capacity: 1000 lbs.
THOUGHTFUL DESIGN: The non-slip strips between the bed slats are designed to help eliminate noise. The overall frame is solid and does not shake. Keep you away from annoying squeaks.

SIMPLE AND LABOR-SAVING INSTALLATION: The bed frame comes with a detailed instruction manual, and each accessory is marked with a number, you can easily install it just by following the drawing. Scan the QR code on the manual to watch the installation video. Contact us with any questions, we will solve your problem within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pliwier Bed Frame with Charging Station Queen Size Bed - Strong Steel Slat Support, Noise Free Pliwier bed frame, do a good job with every bed frame. More exquisite detailing. Stable structure, easy to install, absolutely no squeaking sound. Use good materials and make good sustainable products.

Pliwier Bed Frame with Charging Station Bed Frame - Strong Steel Slat Support, No Box Spring Needed, Noise Free 0.7" Thick Steel Slats Provides You with a Maximum Load Capacity of 1100 LBSThe Bed Frame has 2 standard plug outlets and 2 USB ports with cable management 6.6ft long power cord. Allows you to easily charge electronic products.12.2 Inches Of Storage Space Under The BedThe Accessories Are Made Of High-Quality Screws That Won'T Squeak When Tightened.

Pliwier Bed Frame Product Details Ample Under-bed Storage The bed frame is 12.2 inches off the floor, with plenty of under-bed space. Can store luggage, organizers and other items. Noise Free The unique lock design helps stabilize the bed frame, not only to support the bed frame, but also to prevent the bed from shaking. High Quality Board Made of high quality engineered wood up to 0.6" thick. Color can match any style of room. Waterproof and scratch-resistant. It is the ideal bed frame. Strong Load-Bearing Capacity The maximum load is 1000LBS. Stronger than other traditional bed frames

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is sturdy and was easy to put together, good for a teen boy. Ample storage underneath. The charging port is a nice added feature. Came quicker than expected. Would buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for price
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and sturdy! Looks exactly like the pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This bed frame is simple to put together and sturdy. However, the full size is slightly smaller for full size mattresses. My full size mattress hangs over about 2 inches on the sides and footboard. If you have a full mattress, your best bet would be to go with a queen size. But an overall nice frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING Bed Frame
reviews.reviewText: In a word, this bed frame system is AMAZING!We’ve been using ours for over a month now and I can say that this is by far the sturdiest frame I’ve ever seen or owned. A peeve of mine has always been bed frames that aren’t adequately supported - that creak and groan with shifting weight and that just don’t feel at all supportive. This would be the polar opposite. It has 12 supportive legs and even without the weight of a mattress it feels rock solidly strong. Once the mattress is in place you just know that this is something that will last and provide your mattress with the support it needs.A real bonus for this frame set are the two 110vac plugs and the two USB plugs. That makes it super easy to plug in your electronics and keep on the built in shelf.I absolutely recommend this bed frame system and am extremely pleased with this purchase.FYI, in case you need a mattress recommendation, we paired this frame with a Molblly King Size Firm Mattress, 12 Inch Hybrid Mattress in a Box with Gel Memory Foam (https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0C68FNY3B)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved this, so easy to put together and once it's set up, it looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised with the bed frame, it is sturdy and doesn’t make any noise. Easy enough to put together - think it took an hour. Good deal for the price and allows for a ton of under the bed storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for a 3YO to grow into, and it’s perfect for that. Low to the ground, with ample space for storage under. The headboard is low enough to keep the pillows in place, and the charging port USB is perfect for her night light while I can place the outlet protectors into those for safety. Assembly was easy, parts were well labeled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Definitely needs help to move
reviews.reviewText: Super heavy box when shipped. But super easy set up.
